articles.title: Manchester United's home finale win can't gloss over dismal season, simmering protests - ESPN India
articles.description: Cristiano Ronaldo's goal and a dominant show over Brentford won't soothe Manchester United fans' displeasure over what has been an awful season.
articles.content: MANCHESTER, England -- The first game at Old Trafford this season was a summer friendly against Brentford that Manchester United fans were desperate to get into. The last was a Premier League game ag… [+4899 chars]
